channel.title: Projects on Amar Tabakovic
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Amar Tabakovic

item.title: amartabakovic.ch
item.description: For a while now, I wanted to create a personal website. I originally envisioned to develop it in plain HTML and CSS, then in Webpack and JS, afterwards in Vue.js and now I’ve decided once and for all to use something called Hugo. Tech The website is mainly powered by the static site generator Hugo, which compiles markdown into HTML files. Hugo allows for fast compilation times and lightweight websites.
